casebody.data:
Theodore TRIANGOLO, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 6376. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1931. Theodore Triangolo, in pro. per. Clint W. Hager, U. S. Atty., and Hal Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before'BRYAN, POSTER, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
